title: Engineering Ethics Leadership: Mobile-Based Creative Problem-Solving Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering concepts and intermediate-level job experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen the capacity of corporate R&D leaders and managers to creatively resolve ethical dilemmas encountered in actual work contexts

learning_goals: Learners can develop decision-making scenarios for three or more real-world cases by applying an engineering ethics framework.
Learners can propose two ethical problem-solving strategies while collaborating with peers using mobile devices.
Learners can explain three strategies to enhance learner engagement when designing creative activities for engineering ethics education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
